New Records: LeBron James scored 16 points, five rebounds, and four assists in nearly 35 minutes of play, tying Vince Carter's record for the most seasons played in the NBA (22).
Key Match Events: LeBron James' performance included 16 points, five rebounds, and four assists, showcasing his skills at age 39.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James and his son, Bronny James, made history by becoming the first active father-son duo in NBA history.
